entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Timeout in System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests #86019
  • PreserializedResourceWriterTests.TestResourceManagerIsSafeForConcurrentAccessAndEnumeration test failure #86013
  • Trimmer doesn't warn on reflection access to RUC over #86008
    8.0.0
  • [Hanging test] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicListenerTests.AcceptConnectionAsync_ThrowingOptionsCallback_Throws #86006
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamSniTest.UnencodedHostName_ValidatesCertificate on Android #86003
    8.0.0
  • Wasm perf runs are completely broken due to recent changes #86001
  • Ensure exception count metric is thread-safe #85997
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.NET.HostModel.Tests AppHost.Bundle.Tests failing #85993
  • [Mono] Add a hot reload test for modifying parameter name #85984
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json serializer throws NullReferenceException on `List<Version?>` with a null element #85983
  • [Mono] Implement mono_weak_hash_table_lookup_extended #85982
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json deserializer throws JsonException on `ImmutableSortedSet<Version?>` with a null element #85981
  • NullReferenceException in ConditionalWeakTable`2.Remove #85980
  • HttpClient Timeout in Docker, http endpoint (not https) #86005
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Guid #85994
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 26 Regressions on 5/2/2023 9:04:55 PM #85989
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Math.Clamp<T> #85979
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Vector3 #85992
  • AesCryptoServiceProvider #85974
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Binary.Tests.BinaryReadAndWriteTests #85988
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions on 5/2/2023 10:35:24 AM #85987
  • Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks.Double #85985
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 5/1/2023 6:56:14 PM #85986
  • RuntimeHostConfigurationOption for GC configuration ignored in NativeAOT #85961
  • Intermittend failures in ThreadPoolTests on Mono Linux ARM64 #85960
  • JIT: widening stack memory loads can cause store-forward stalls #85957

Closed

  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestChainTests/CreateChain_Hybrid #25979
  • Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks.Single #85711
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent date and time patterns #86017
  • Assertion failed 'info->m_weight > BB_ZERO_WEIGHT' #85838
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Missed devirtualization opportunities due to Unsafe.As #85906
  • Unsafe.As doesn't update type information in JIT #84377
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\SIMD\\Matrix4x4_ro\\Matrix4x4_ro.cmd #85899
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Incorrect redundant branch opts example #85892
  • [WASI] WASI Console application: "Could not find wasi-sdk" with wasi-experimental workload and WasmSingleFileBundle=true (with macOS 13.3.1 on ARM M1) #85971
  • `new FileStream(fd,..., isAsync:true)` doesn't appear to be supported on Unix #85560
  • How to set DateTimeFormat.ShortTimePattern by Environment variables #85973
  • PropertyTabAttribute.Equals(PropertyTabAttribute other) should likely accept null #55178
    Future
  • Performance regression on Fortunes Windows #85930
  • [API Proposal]: Base64.IsValid #76020
    8.0.0
  • Readonly access of JsonObject with dynamic is not working #85943
  • JIT: Block morphing does not handle that decomposed writes can affect the destination #85874
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Make exception count performance counter thread-safe #86018
    area-System.Threading
  • LSRA Throughput: Do not pass `RegisterType` for non-arm #86016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests for RUC warnings on override methods #86015
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Add arm64 dynamic pgo runs #86014
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove generated locals in RegexCompiler.LoadSearchValues #86010
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhiteSpace #86007
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move assignment rationalization to before forward substitution #86004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Dedup PemEncoding.TryCountBase64 with Base64.IsValid #86002
    area-System.Security
  • [NativeAOT] Update ILCompiler paths to handle PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #85996
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix mismatched types in native host test error messaging #85995
    area-Host
  • Fix NativeLibraryTests for ilasm round-trip #85991
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85977
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85976
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT/EE interface cleanup #85975
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `NativeMemory` in `System.Data.Odbc` #85966
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [mono][mini] Fix conversion from r4/r8 to native u #85964
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Fixed errors in jit and unwinding #85900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable profile repairs of OSR entry block weight is zero #86011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use a fixed chrome version for testing #86012
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use string.IsNullOrEmpty and ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty in many more places #85858
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [wasi] Fix support for paths with spaces #85998
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, os-wasi, needs-area-label
  • [6.0-staging] Improve Servicing Docs #85955
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Update class for Unsafe.As<>() #85954
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Generate 'native-indirect' wrappers in full-aot mode. #85923
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Update life of data node for simd12 #85956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Use .tar.gz for pintools on Linux #85999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop special casing reflected-on internals #85963
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Attempt to bypass emscripten's generated wrappers for cwraps #85919
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Upgrade System.Reflection.Metadata version #85738
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Speed up typeof #85962
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [PERF] Revert "performance-setup.sh requires urllib3 version <2 (#85915)" #86009
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • SPMI: Export dynamic symbols in superpmi for unix builds #85967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix bug in jump threading #85942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move assignment rationalization to before global morph #85872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unroll StringBuilder.Append for const string #85894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert urllib reorder #86000
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update PropertyTabAttribute.Equals() nullability #85896
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Exclude the test DevDiv_255294.cmd on Windows arm in issues.targets #85928
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable foreground-shutdown test on Windows #85936
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Disable IUnknownTest under GCStress #85937
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [PERF] Fix Linux Musl Alpine Core Root build #85946
    area-Infrastructure
  • Improve IndexOfAnyValues throughput for needles with 0 #84184
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Fix ReadOnlySpanGetReferenceAndReadInteger on BigEndian #85969
    area-System.Memory
  • Delete `gtNewBlkOpNode` and `lvSimdBaseJitType` #85848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold "FrozenObjectHandle(REF) + CNS" to a byref constant #85888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update File.cs #85648
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] amend the multiply's overflow check and delete some unused codes. #85959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Base64.IsValid and allow Base64.DecodeXx methods to skip whitespace #85938
    area-System.Memory, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Do not generate PerfMap entries for methods we didn't compile #85958
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - Override KnownWebAssemblySdkPack to 8.0.0-dev #85815
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix block morphing/physical promotion self-interference #85887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop using ref counts in forward sub #85909
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove check from FillStringChecked and rename it to CopyStringContent #85880
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expose various integer intrinsics for Avx512F, Avx512BW, and Avx512CD #85833
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix WaitForExitAsync could return a cancelled task #85882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Intrinsics analyzer and fixes #85481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update mariner images to latest with LLVM 16 #84676
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Fold typeof(T).TypeHandle.Value #85804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enabling RuntimeEventSource in NativeAOT #85424
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Fix an assert. #85950
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono] Avoid an assert if the class name table is too large. #85952
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Capture remaining binding methods for source generator support #85843
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Constrained mask should take into account busy registers #85933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Misc LSRA throughput improvements #85842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Peel offsets from spilled addresses for store decomposition #85889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable v128 and wasm packedsimd in the interpreter #85920
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Webcil-in-WebAssembly #85932
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Add PreserveSig support to ComInterfaceGenerator #85941
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 7.0 #84679
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.7
  • [Release/6.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 6.0 #84680
    Servicing-approved, breaking-change, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 6.0.18
  • Remove last `!` from Caching.Abstractions #85918
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2/r2rdump for LA64. #85038
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Seed stress modes by string hash #83771
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SHA3 #84132
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Save 250k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    api-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [DRAFT] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] [browser] fix job queue timespan calculation #85784
    Servicing-consider, needs-area-label, 7.0.x
  • Fix issue with hoisting and copy prop interaction #85493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs (#58417) #84358
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.7
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • fix JsonNode deserialising from null #85463
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Use popcount intrinsincs in BitOperations #85944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] loader #85730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove Windows arm32 support #85947
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimizations for Ascii.Equals and Ascii.EqualsIgnoreCase #85926
    area-System.Text.Encoding, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove static modifiers from ThreadPool events in NativeRuntimeEventSource.PortableThreadPool.NativeSinks.cs #85563
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Add ToDictionary() overloads for KeyValuePair and ValueTuple kv. #85811
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Zip.Unix: don't hang when creating zip file from directory with named pipe. #85301
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to devirtualize call if we have type information about `this` #85528
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • ProcessTests: allow WorkingSet to be zero just after launching the process. #85649
    community-contribution
  • Allow set GC configuration in NativeAOT #85921
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Centralize peephole optimization for removing redundant `mov` instructions #85780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete rarely used bashing methods and add some documentation on bashing #85925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EmbeddedResourceUseDependentUponConvention value "true" should be "false" according to documentation #32364
  • Templates create compile errors in solutions with Central Package Management (CPM) #32367
  • Merge 'dotnet suggest' into 'dotnet complete' #32354
  • [NETE2ESDK][MAC][Loc]With 8.0 Preview4 SDK installed, the texts in CLI are partly unlocalized after running "dotnet --info" #32346

Closed

  • YouTube videos #31981
  • Users can build and publish container images for their applications natively #24216
    8.0.1xx
  • Dotnet failed to run after publishing on debian with the error below #32363

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.3xx] added `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.dll` to package content #32375
    Area-Containers
  • Handle Uri-less Realms during basic auth, and fix auth lookups for hosts with ports specified #32371
    Area-Containers
  • [Own build] Don't use AssemblyInformationCachePaths #32355
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove duplicate packages #32347
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • 9500 dotnet tool install: Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade when specify version #31549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the NETSDK1094 errors #32058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32338
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #32339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104

PullRequests

Created

  • Create breaking-change-warnings.md #7182
  • Add details to lookup rules for for extensions #7179

Updated

  • Add speclet for `ref readonly` parameters #7165

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Potential JSON analyzer stackoverflow #68136

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33709.183 #68142
  • Assertion fails when generating code for pointer conversion #66961
    17.7
  • Add `AdditionalTextValueProvider<TValue>` #67611
    Backlog
  • BindingDiagnosticBags should be pooled #67785
    17.7
  • `SyntaxNodeProvider` should keep track of removed items #67633
    17.7
  • Using the VB.NET NameOf operator with an event name doesn't work unless used within the same class #68004
    17.7
  • Record struct initialization behavior differs from record classes #68126
    17.7
  • Compiler allow wrong implicit convert from zero (0) to Enum in method argument without emit an error or warning! #68127
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2177164 #68148
  • Add feature to help people move to using primary constructors. #68147
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement more validation for inline array element access and conversion scenarios #68146
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Merge main to features/StructDiagnosticBag #68141
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Implement member lookup for extension types #68137
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #68145
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.4 release branch #67903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Install ServiceHub x64 vsix for integration test #68113
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Compare reference names up front #68133
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge
  • Eliminate enumerator boxing in basic block analysis #68139
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into InlineArrays #68140
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #68066
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add `AdditionalTextValueProvider<TValue>` #68092
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Add ServiceHub vsix for ARM64 #68099
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Enable some `await` scenarios involving inline arrays #68129
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Remove need for inheritance in BindingDiagnosticBag #68042
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Break cycles in attribute binding #68067
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Check language version for inline arrays feature #68109
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add test for var pattern capturing after disjunctive type test #68138
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Finalize testing and implementation around object initializers for inline arrays. #68064
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Allocate all CSharp.BindingDiagnosticBag instances from a pool. #68108
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68150
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #68149
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • LSP.Range may request beyond length of file #68081
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use correct ref-pack versions #67895
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods #68132
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Remove redundant hex digit validator from lexer #68016
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.7
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - Source Generators
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • Make existing instance methods on BindingDiagnosticBag into extensions #68043
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use a singleton sentinel for empty type-parameters for non-generic named-types and methods. #68131
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on remaining analysis contexts #68052
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Only pack the shipping/non-shipping nupkgs for roslyn #67679
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Report only warning for `ref` argument at `in` parameter #68087
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #67857
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Razor internals #67644
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Remove all fields from SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol in the common case. #68135
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Aspnet core webhook #48153
  • Fully occupied /tmp for ASP Dot Net Core hosted on AWS Lambda is breaking API's #48149
  • Build fails with node 20 #48146
  • The RAM memory remains full even if the object is no longer used #48145
  • Handle browser cache for static files after deploying new code in Blazor WASM #48143
  • Crash issue with SignalR-Client-CPP ， Help me #48139

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #48141
  • Bootstrap Behaviour Not working properly #48028
  • OnSubmit function on Form not working as expected #48050
  • [Analyzer/Codefixer] Recommend using `AddAuthorizationBuilder` for configuring global policies #45219
    Backlog
  • Custom InputText has a null ElementReference #48115
  • AddSignalR ClientTimeoutInterval doesn't work #48147
  • Blazor WebAssembly Msal TryAddAdditionalParameter does nothing #48136
  • Conditional onparamterasync #48100
  • IJSObjectReference.InvokeAsync crashes when returning large data #48142
  • ControllerBase Route attribute is ignored in dynamically loaded AssemblyParts #47980
    8.0-preview5
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #48134

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly #48154
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2176883 #48152
    area-mvc
  • Documentation for diagnostic codes used in repo #48151
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Expand support for MapX methods in RDG #48012
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview5
  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, 8.0-preview5
  • Extend Templates.Mvc.Tests timeout #48144
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2175980 #48131
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Use Node 18 (LTS) #48087
    area-infrastructure
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Code Fix for AfterOnResourceExecution Diagnostic Event. #48077
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Make KestrelConfigurationLoader.Load safe to re-call #48137
    area-runtime
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime, feature-rdg
  • Added TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix StackOverflowException in RoutePatternAnalyzer #48105
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #47950

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issue on Datalist after Windows 10 upgrade of latest Webview2 #15005
  • Button with ImageSource that's too big for button renders incorrectly #15004
  • Buttons with images not cropping correctly on screen resize on macOS if using ContentLayout #15003
  • Button not honoring MaximumWidthRequest on iOS, Mac, and Android #15002
  • Request a feature to open a Picker selection window ( as if we are clicking on the picker with a mouse ) #15001
  • File picker multi select #14996
  • Memory Leak with CollectionView #14993
  • MAUI - File picker - option to only to choose file and no more #14992
  • Vertical size not working correctly in grid/stack layout #14991
  • MAUI Android | Carousel in the page is being stretched in landscape mode #14989
  • W2DStringSizeService use DrawBounds as text size is not compatible with iOS and Android. #14988

Closed

  • Can't build to local iOS device after updating MAUI workload with Hot Restart #14578
  • CharacterSpacing Causes Button Layout to be Incorrect #14243
    Backlog
  • ListView: Label - LineBreakMode Middle Truncation #11451
    Backlog
  • CollectionView EmptyView does not display on Android. #13284
    Backlog
  • ImageButton does not respect the height and width given to it #7927
    Backlog
  • Accessing string resource throws a false FileNotFoundException in Android #7443
  • The MAUI Blazor doesn't work on iOS 16.2 arm64 simulator #12124
    .NET 8 Planning
  • CollectionView slow/jittering scroll #12130
    Backlog
  • Listview - When IsPullToRefreshEnabled is enabled controls on ItemTemplate are not clickable #7402
  • Page layout is completely messed up in Android after adding too many controls #7434

PullRequests

Created

  • Just trying out some things #15000
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Testing InputTransparency things #14998
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1722.45 to 1.0.1774.30 #14994
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [Android] Changes updating ImageButton Padding to avoid size issues #14905
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Remove Controls Navigation Controller #14976
  • Add the Platform* APIs for Graphics #14816

Updated

  • Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #14951
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Use Platform* Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [WIP] Dev/update mappers #14948
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Don't retain parameters not passed as query string parameters #14965
    t/breaking 💥, p/1, partner/cat 😻, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix iOS ListView cell gone hidden (#11287) #13669
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/ListView
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
  • Move Windows and iOS Frame measure and arrange to xplat layer #14987
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [Android] Correctly notify ImageButton border changes #14874
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-button

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 7.0.5 nuget Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite copies wrong version of SQLitePCLRaw.core.dll #30863
  • Performance issue while querying for a high page number. #30861
  • Using ExecuteUpdateAsync with owned entity throws exception #30860
  • Consider tracking original expression nodes for better exception messages #30859
  • Decimals being truncated in EF Core #30858
  • Model compiler fails to include namespace in generated code #30857
  • ExecuteUpdate: Duplicate table alias in generated Update query #30856
  • GroupBy with unused intermediate null field: ArgumentOutOfRangeException #30855
  • GenerateCreateScript doesn't return SQL for creating views #30854
  • Running with compiled model fails to load entity properties defined in abstract base class when in different assembly #30853
  • Silent data loss when adding objects to an sqlite DB with PRAGMA journal_mode=DELETE in a multi-threaded environment. #30851

Closed

  • OwnsOne Property, dbContext.GetProperties() #30862
  • GenerateCreateScript difference between 3.1 and 7.0 #30844
  • Unable to use `ExecuteUpdate` or `ExecuteDelete` with properties of owned entities #30833
  • Update handling of non-nullable store-generated properties #15070
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle enum literals that are not a defined value of the enum #30852

Merged

  • Update handling for bools and enums with database defaults #30843

Updated

  • SQLite Scaffolding: Use column type and values to provide a better CLR type #30816
  • Better support for inline primitive collections with parameters #30846
  • Add analyzer/codefix for usage of interpolated strings in raw query methods #30835
